item.description: Gene will be leading an afternoon walk tomorrow at Bare Cove in Hingham. Great 3.5 mile walk on wide. flat trails, beaches and mud puddles for dog swims (bring a towel). This is an off leash park, dogs should be under voice control. Dogs are supposed to be leashed in the parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: Gene will be waiting inside the fire gate

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Mid Day at Bare Cove
